pages.description: EIGHTY2 ON M is a bold new development, located in the heart of Sea Point's high street within close proximity to the beachfront and Promenade. The building will house 100 units â€“ Micro, Studio, One Bedroom and Two Bedroom apartments. Intelligently and thoughtfully designed, this development conceptualises a modern playfulness and discerning attention to detail. EIGHTY2 ON M is a green building, not only in terms of natural spaces but also energy. The building boasts green, landscaped spaces with an urban garden.
